articles.author: Shashank Kishore
articles.title: Ishan Kishan: 'I lost my focus trying to finish games rather than giving good starts' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "Initially when I started the tournament, I wasn't over-thinking, I was just going and batting, like I used to do"
